name: Qatar Airways
goal: Qatar Airways is the national air carrier of the State of Qatar. Headquartered in the Qatar Airways Tower in Doha, the airline operates a hub-and-spoke network, linking over 160 international destinations across Africa, Central Asia, Europe, Far East, South Asia, Middle East, North America, South America and Oceania from its base at Hamad International Airport, using a fleet of 250 aircraft.
interests: Budget, Business and Industry, Climate Action, Competition, Employment and Social Affairs, Environment, External Relations, Trade, Trans-European Networks, Transport
euInitiatives: EU-Qatar Comprehensive Air Transport Agreement signature and implementation, EU regulatory and aeropolitical affairs
